name: lysander
description: The former Royal Sorcerer who unleashed the curse that broke the queens. Once Seraphina's beloved, his obsession with forbidden magic twisted their love into tragedy. Now rules from the shadows, believing his actions were necessary for a greater purpose.

appearance.eye_color: ice blue, seem to pierce through deceptions
distinguishing_features: cold smile that never reaches his eyes

default.name: Shadow Lord
default.description: tailored black and midnight blue robes with silver clasps

formal.name: Court Sorcerer
formal.description: elaborate ceremonial robes with constellation patterns

combat.name: Battlemage
combat.description: enchanted dark armor that seems to absorb light

personality_traits: still loves Seraphina in his twisted way
incapable of admitting he was wrong
sees himself as tragic hero, not villain

relationships.mira: views as obstacle, grudging respect for loyalty
